HEADER.Title: Attach the jar to current agent

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PRV.STORE" ,"VERACODETOOL", C, N
! Setting jar class path into variable :SET &UC4RB_PATH_JAR#= STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#,"VeracodeJavaAPI.jar")

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This includes attaches the jar to current agent It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment
